resolution_description: As 'Scallops', I propose a revolutionary approach by integrating advanced AI-driven monitoring systems that utilize underwater drones to ensure real-time regulation and adaptive management of harvesting practices, while simultaneously creating an interactive educational platform for local communities to foster stewardship and appreciation for the delicate marine ecosystem in the Gulf of Saint-Brieuc.
new_actor: The name of the actor that will be created is "Gulf of Saint-Brieuc Marine Stewardship Alliance."

required_participants.reasoning: The researchers are crucial for developing and implementing the advanced AI-driven monitoring systems. Their expertise will ensure that the technology is effective and scientifically sound, leading to better regulation of harvesting practices.

Fishermen are key stakeholders in the harvesting practices and will need to be actively involved in the adaptive management strategies. Their cooperation is essential for the success of the resolution and for fostering stewardship among local communities.

Colleagues-scientists can provide additional support in research and development of the educational platform and monitoring systems. Their collaboration can enhance the scientific credibility and effectiveness of the proposed solutions.

The population of sea scallops is directly impacted by the proposed measures. Understanding their biological and ecological needs is vital for creating effective management strategies that ensure their sustainability in the Gulf of Saint-Brieuc.

resolution_description: As 'Translation', I propose a novel resolution by facilitating cross-disciplinary and cross-cultural collaborations that translate traditional ecological knowledge and innovative scientific research into a comprehensive multilingual digital platform, enabling global stakeholders to co-create adaptive, culturally sensitive strategies for the sustainable management of the dwindling scallop populations in the Gulf of Saint-Brieuc.
